thread.title: Kakatiya, Satavahana Universities Postpone Exams Due to Heavy Rains
thread.title_full: Kakatiya, Satavahana Universities Postpone Exams Due to Heavy Rains

author: deccanchronicle.com
title: Kakatiya, Satavahana Universities Postpone Exams Due to Heavy Rains
text:
Kakatiya, Satavahana Universities Postpone Exams Due to Heavy Rains Telangana DC Correspondent 28 Aug 2025 11:34 AM IST Fresh dates to be announced soon; remaining exams to continue as per schedule x Kakatiya University Warangal: Owing to incessant rains, Kakatiya University has postponed the Degree and PG examinations scheduled for August 28 and 29, Controller of Examinations Prof. Rajender Katla said in a statement. The remaining exams will be held as per schedule, while fresh dates for the postponed exams will be announced shortly.
Similarly, Satavahana University has postponed the BEd and MEd examinations scheduled for today. University officials said the rescheduled dates will be announced soon, and the remaining examinations will continue as planned.
( Source : Deccan Chronicle )
